card.name: Spiral Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Emergency Typhoon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Draw up to 2 cards. Then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: Lucky Ball
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has 3 or fewer shields, draw up to 2 cards.

card.name: Dacity Dragoon, Explosive Beast
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

card.name: Glennya, Boiling Water
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Dondon Vacuuming Now
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card revealed this way was a fire or nature card, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Crossfire, Millionaire
card.text: ■ Gravity Zero ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Pulsar, Trans Suction
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, discard your hand, then draw 2 cards.
